alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Ashe; Wilkes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:51PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT ALLEGHANY...NORTHWESTERN WILKES AND CENTRAL ASHE COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN NORTH CAROLINA THROUGH 130 PM EDT... At 1251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Scottville to Fleetwood. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sparta... Jefferson... West Jefferson... Laurel Springs... Glendale Springs... Mc Grady... and Fleetwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
